description: React component implementing a redirect page for Confluence login via OAuth, handling query parameters and fallback messages when backend URL is not configured.

methods.name: ConfluenceLoginRedirectPage
methods.description: Functional React component that displays a Suspense wrapper with a redirect worker.

methods.name: RedirectWorker
methods.description: Performs URL computation and redirection to backend OAuth login; displays error message if backend URL is missing.
